original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2686)@  在武將四周，召喚出2隻<color=#4cc769>虎豹騎</color>，攻擊附近的敵人。  <color=#4cc769>虎豹騎</color>屬性  <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1216)@  武力值：$Soldier_Str(1216)@
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2686)@ Around the generals, two <color=#4cc769>tiger and leopard riders</color> were summoned to attack nearby enemies. <color=#4cc769> Tiger and Leopard Riding</color> Attributes <color=#FFE787>Physical Strength: </color>$Soldier_HP(1216)@ Force Value:  $Soldier_Str(1216)@
